item.title: Server.java Help
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

Im trying to add my SYIpkpker Blocker to my ipbanner in public void run() but i got these errors

server.java:160: 'catch' without 'try' } catch (IOException e) { ^ server.java:200: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ server.java:204: class, interface, or enum expected } else { ^ server.java:206: class, interface, or enum expected s.close(); ^ server.java:207: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ server.java:212: class, interface, or enum expected } else { ^ server.java:214: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ server.java:221: class, interface, or enum expected public void killServer() { ^ server.java:224: class, interface, or enum expected if(clientListener != null) clientListener.close(); ^ server.java:225: class, interface, or enum expected clientListener = null; ^ server.java:226: class, interface, or enum expected } catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) { ^ server.java:228: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ server.java:231: class, interface, or enum expected public static int EnergyRegian = 60; ^ server.java:233: class, interface, or enum expected public static int MaxConnections = 100000; ^ server.java:234: class, interface, or enum expected public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:235: class, interface, or enum expected public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections]; ^ server.java:236: class, interface, or enum expected public static boolean ShutDown = false; ^ server.java:237: class, interface, or enum expected public static int ShutDownCounter = 0; ^ server.java:238: class, interface, or enum expected public static int Foundz = 1; ^ server.java:239: class, interface, or enum expected public static int resetplayz; ^ server.java:242: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 21 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
